packageName: Hubitat → Xbar App for the Apple  macOS™ Menubar
author: Kurt Sanders
releaseNotes:
After this HPM upgrade of the 'Hubitat  →Xbar', you must manually upgrade the Xbar plugin 'Hubitat_XBar.5m.py' to this same 1.0.2 release in the Xbar plugin directory. Please follow the install instructions in the documentation.

This release has the following improvements:

  • Several display bugs. 
  • Checks to determine if HSM is installed and handles options accordingly.
  • Standardizes default font sizes.
  • Reduces log view messages.
  • Verifies release numbers of python and groovy scripts to be the same and outputs a message to upgrade if different.
